text: Roman Pavlovich Zakharov (Russian: Роман Павлович Захаров; born 11 July 1929) is a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxless four where they were eliminated in the semi-final repêchage. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Roman Zakharov
